executive_summary: Frontend focused Software Developer % with proficiency in leveraging cross platform development tools (React ecosystem) for web and mobile applications.
A divergent thinker with the temperament to assimilate recent technologies and frameworks to solve real world problems.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
summary: Improved longevity and frontend/end-user useability of <link href = "https://usaidnigeriaprs.com"><font color="blue">Monitor (Government Data Reporting Platform)</font></link> by designing, developing and delivering new features, enhancements and bug fixes.

Fully revamped the way data entry works for the platform with a complete architecture and UI/UX overhaul (from designing user flow and user experience to implementation) resulting in a much more user-friendly and streamlined data entry process.
Mentored, trained and onboarded new team member into the frontend codebase and framework effectively cutting down on time and getting up to speed on the product for swift contributions.
Tech Stack: React.js, React Hooks, React-Redux, React Router, Ruby On Rails, Capybara (For UI/UX and integration tests), AWS, Docker

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
summary: Co-founded start up which provides customers with a mobile app (<link href = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NzvBsUQzI_g"><font color="blue">iOS</font></link> and <link href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yugipal&hl=en_US&gl=US"><font color="blue">Android</font></link>) that allows them to store their Tradable Card collection.
Learnt the ropes of product and software development lifecycle by designing and implementing various features, enhancements and bug fixes across the tech stack.

Designed and architected a product recognition algorithm and its associated image database primarly for Tradable Card detection on iOS and Android devices resulting in a faster onboarding of a user's card collection.
Significantly minimized manual work by developing and implementing automated data gathering and harvesting tools for image processing and database dumps.
Tech Stack: React.js , React Native, React-Redux, OpenCV, SQLite, XCode, Andriod Studio, AWS, Firebase
Redesigned and overhauled the monitor software from the ground up.
Designed and implemented automatic local database (scanner image database and sqlite database) updates that are separate from app updates.

hobbies: Avid onewheeler (single wheel electric skateboard) and a youtube content creator.
